name: Horse marathon
description:
This game is being to continue to develop.

If you find any bug, just write a comment below and I'll fix it.

Controlls

1 Slow down

2 Speed up

ESC - Pause

WASD - movement

Space - Jump(but remember, when you go through the 'not the road' area, your lap will not be counted(jump is only for go away from that area));

Used assets

Overcloud - Sky and sun

POLYGON Western pack - models

Horse Animset Pro - Horses and AI

POLYGON Horse pack - additional models and skins of horse
